fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR DateX = SELECTEDVALUE('Date X (comparison date)'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate]
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Internal ? (group)] = "external"
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Forward Start ?] = 0,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        DateX = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate]
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Internal ? (group)] = "external"
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Forward Start ?] = 0,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    )
)
